cast.name: 拉丽萨·威尔森 Larissa Wilson
巴斯卡尔·帕特尔 Bhasker Patel

introduction: Conviction tells the story of convicted terrorist Isa Ibrahim, the Bristol college student from a supportive family background, who in a short period of time became an Islamic extremist that began experimenting with explosive material. Designed to help understand the reasoning behind his actions, Conviction is used in a training capacity by police and community groups to help discuss the vulnerabilities that surround young men like Isa who are particularly susceptible to the ideology of hate promoted through Anti western propaganda made prominent on the internet.
